apple_vendor_description: This Apple-designed emoji depicts a couple embracing, with the man showcasing a medium-dark skin tone and his partner a medium-light skin tone, a heartwarming representation of diverse relationships. Their connection is emphasized by a vibrant heart suspended between them, glowing with Apple's characteristic glossy sheen and realistic lighting. On Apple devices, this pair symbolizes deep affection, partnership, and shared joy, bringing warmth and inclusivity to any message.
